scripts.i: npm i && cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.ci: npm ci && cd server && npm ci && cd ../client && npm ci
scripts.build: cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../client && npm run lint
scripts.test: cd server && npm run test:ci && cd ../client && npm run test:ci
scripts.e2e: start-server-and-test server http://localhost:4201 client http://localhost:4200 cypress:ci
